title: 3+ Bedroom $3,100 1300+ sf
posting_body: For rent by owner: spacious 3+ bedroom with tons of extras in beautiful neighborhood in the heart of Malden, walking distance to shops, restaurants, and breweries.

Located on the second and third floors, the apartment features high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout, new stainless steel appliances, an in-wall air conditioner, and a private covered front porch.
The second floor features a large, light-filled living room adjoining a spacious kitchen with tons of cabinet space, large bathroom, and an in-unit dryer.
Also on the second floor are two large bedrooms, with options for additional living space, perfect for entertaining.
The third floor features two additional bedrooms and a bonus office workspace with tons of room for extra storage, perfect for working from home.
The basement features a washing machine (free), and a detached garage offers additional storage.
Cats are OK, and dogs are permitted on a case by case basis.
